import React from "react"; import { NavLink } from "react-router-dom"; const Users = ({ userData, reposData, setSearchInput }) => { const handleClear = () => { setSearchInput(""); } return ( <>
{userData.length !== 0 ? <>

{userData.name}

{`The total number of repositories is ${userData.public_repos}`}

List of repositories:

    {reposData.map((data) => ( <>

  • {data.name}

    {data.description}

    • ))}
:

Please try another username

}
); }; export default Users;
